name: Raft Man
description:
This is a "game" I made in a little less than 12 hours. It is pretty much just a guy on a raft that fishes up fun things and does jumping jacks. I just wanted something to look at while I watch the stocks I like. 

*THIS IS NOT A GAME WHERE YOU HAVEV INPUT, YOU JUST WATCH THE LITTLE GUY DO HIS THING*

I plan to update this frequently with more stuff for the little guy to do, suggestions are welcome. I do not want to tell exactly what all he can find now, because that would be a spoiler, but other than fish there are 5 rare things he can fish up.
